1.original_text: En matemática se llama base a los lados paralelos, ésta es base y ésta es base. ¿Por qué escribí grande y chica? Porque ésta se llama base menor y ésta se llama base mayor. Vengo a mi dibujo, ustedes ven que ésta sería la base mayor y ven que ésta sería la base menor del trapecio y ésta cuál sería la base mayor y ésta cuál sería la base menor. Entonces, y me dio un rectábulo que supongo que todos saben que hace por altura.

4.translated_text: In mathematics it is called base to the parallel sides, this is base and this is base. Why did I write big and small? Because this is called the minor base and this is called the major base. I come to my drawing, you see that this would be the major base and you see that this would be the minor base of the trapeze and this would be the major base and this would be the minor base. Then, and gave me a retabule that I suppose everyone knows what it does by height.

13.original_text: Las fuertes lluvias registradas en los últimos dos días en Marruecos han inundado varios barrios de la ciudad de Casa Blanca y una casa se derrumbó en Derbe-Mureysh-Rief-en-Hei-Mohamedi, donde falleció una persona y otras dos fueron trasladadas de urgencia al Hospital Provincial Mohamed V en Casa Blanca. Vamos a ofrecerles los detalles de este suceso y de cómo está la situación en la capital económica del reino. La tragedia ocurrió en el barrio Mule Shrift, donde una casa de tres pisos se vino abajo, debido a las intensas lluvias registradas en las últimas 72 horas que debilitaron las paredes de este edificio, quedándose total.

donde falleció una persona y otras dos fueron trasladadas de urgencia al Hospital Provincial
Mohamed V en Casa Blanca. Vamos a ofrecerles los detalles de este suceso y de cómo está
la situación en la capital económica del reino.

debido a las intensas lluvias registradas en las últimas 72 horas que debilitaron las
paredes de este edificio, quedándose total.

14.translated_text: The heavy rains of the last two days in Morocco have flooded several neighborhoods of the city of Casa Blanca and one house collapsed in Derbe-Mureysh-Rief-en-Hei-Mohamedi, where one person died and two others were moved urgently to Mohamed V Provincial Hospital in Casa Blanca. We will offer you the details of this event and how the situation is in the economic capital of the kingdom. The tragedy occurred in the Mule Shrift neighborhood, where a three-story house collapsed, due to the intense rains recorded in the last 72 hours that weakened the walls of this building, remaining totally.

translated_chunks.text: Heavy rains in Morocco over the past two days have flooded several
neighborhoods of the city of White House and a house collapsed in Derbe-Mureysh-Rief-en-Hei-Mohamedi,
where one person died and two others were rushed to the Provincial Hospital
Mohamed V at the White House. We will give you the details of this event and how it is
the situation in the economic capital of the kingdom.
The tragedy occurred in the Mule Shrift neighborhood, where a three-story house fell apart,
due to heavy rains in the last 72 hours that weakened the
walls of this building, staying total.

4.text_content: Heavy rains of the last two days in Morocco have flooded several neighborhoods of the city of Casa Blanca. One house collapsed in Derbe-Mureysh-Rief-en-Hei-Mohamedi, where one person died and two others were moved urgently to hospital.
